milestones.title: Requirements Validation Complete

milestones.title: Foundation Configuration Complete

items.title: CRITICAL: Clarify NetSuite Current Usage Status
items.description: System Inventory doc suggests NetSuite already in use for inventory, but project context suggests new implementation. This fundamentally changes project approach (expansion vs. greenfield). MUST clarify in kickoff.

references.description: AMB-002: Inventory Management System vs. NetSuite IMS

predicates.condition: CTO and IT Lead available for kickoff meeting

notes.author: user
notes.content: This is a new implementation.  Inventory management today is in their POS and Quickbooks.

items.title: CRITICAL: Decide Custom OMS Future State
items.description: Determine if SunStyle Order Hub (custom OMS) will be retired and replaced by NetSuite native OMS, or will remain and integrate. Major architectural decision impacting scope, timeline, integrations.

items.title: CRITICAL: Decide Lightspeed POS Future State
items.description: Determine if Lightspeed POS remains in stores (requiring integration) or will be replaced by NetSuite POS. Impacts store operations, integration scope, timeline, budget, training.

references.description: AMB-005: Lightspeed POS vs. NetSuite POS

items.title: CRITICAL: Confirm Fiscal Calendar
items.description: Confirm fiscal calendar is January-December and will NOT change. Foundational to accounting periods configuration, tax reporting, budget cycles.

items.title: CRITICAL: Confirm Inventory Costing Method
items.description: Confirm inventory costing method: Average Cost (assumed), FIFO, or Standard Cost. Discuss with external auditors. Major impact on COGS and inventory valuation. Consider if prescription lenses need different costing.

items.title: Validate Network Connectivity at All 25 Stores
items.description: Validate all 25 stores have reliable high-speed internet (minimum 50 Mbps). Test connectivity, latency, uptime. Identify stores needing network upgrades. Critical for real-time inventory, POS integration, system performance.

references.description: Q-IT-004: Network connectivity at all 25 stores

items.title: Conduct Data Quality Assessment
items.description: Audit data quality in current systems (QuickBooks, OMS, Lightspeed POS). Verify data is accurate and exportable. Identify cleanup needs. Document data gaps and transformation requirements.

references.description: Q-IT-010: Data quality in current systems

items.title: Validate Transaction Volumes and Stakeholder Availability
items.description: Confirm current transaction volumes (~500 orders/day, ~150k transactions/year) will remain stable. Confirm key stakeholders available 25-50% time for requirements, decisions, UAT. Verify SMEs available 10 hrs/week.

references.description: BA-001: Transaction Volumes, RA-001: Stakeholder Availability

items.title: Schedule Finance Workshop (Week 1)
items.description: Schedule comprehensive finance workshop with CFO, Controller, External Auditor. Cover fiscal calendar, costing methods, revenue recognition, depreciation schedules, payment terms, sales tax nexus, budget process.

items.title: Finance Workshop: Gather Depreciation Schedule Details
items.description: Document depreciation schedules for all fixed asset categories: useful life, depreciation method (straight-line vs. accelerated), conventions (half-year, mid-quarter, full-month). Required for fixed asset setup.

references.description: Q-FIN-005: Depreciation schedules for fixed assets

items.title: Finance Workshop: Clarify Service Revenue Recognition
items.description: Clarify when service revenue is recognized: extended warranties (deferred or at sale?), repair services (at service or pickup?), prescription services (at verification or shipment?). Critical for revenue accounts and deferred revenue setup.

items.title: Finance Workshop: Document Sales Tax Nexus States
items.description: Document all sales tax nexus states: physical nexus (all store locations), economic nexus (e-commerce thresholds met), marketplace facilitator implications (Shopify). Confirm filing frequencies. Required for SuiteTax configuration.

items.title: Finance Workshop: Define AR Management - B2C vs B2B Payment Terms
items.description: Define payment terms for B2C (prepaid assumed) and B2B wholesale customers. Document credit limits, aging policies, collection procedures.

references.description: Q-FIN-009: AR management - B2C vs B2B payment terms

items.title: Operations Workshop: Document Warehouse Day Walkthrough
items.description: Walkthrough typical warehouse day: receiving process, put-away, picking, packing, shipping, cycle counting. Document bin numbering scheme, barcode usage, staffing model.

items.title: Operations Workshop: Define Ship-from-Store Decision Algorithm
items.description: Document the logic for ship-from-store selection: warehouse stock check, nearest store with stock, cost/speed optimization, avoid depleting store display stock. Define thresholds and rules.

items.title: Operations Workshop: Document BOPIS Process Walkthrough
items.description: Document complete BOPIS (Buy Online, Pick Up In Store) process: order receipt, inventory allocation, store notification, picking, customer notification, ID verification, handoff. Define SLAs.

items.title: Operations Workshop: Document Prescription Verification Workflow
items.description: Document prescription verification process: optometrist (employed or external?), verification steps, liability, professional liability insurance, regulatory compliance, prescription data handling (PHI/HIPAA).

items.title: Operations Workshop: Define Store Replenishment Rules
items.description: Define store replenishment frequency (daily, weekly, event-based?), trigger (reorder point, sales velocity?), quantity calculation, seasonality adjustments.

references.description: GAP-PTI-003: Store replenishment frequency, trigger, quantity rules

items.title: E-Commerce Workshop: Clarify Shopify vs NetSuite Master System
items.description: Clarify which system is master for: product content (Shopify assumed), SKU/pricing (NetSuite assumed), inventory (NetSuite). Document data flow direction and conflict resolution strategy.

references.description: Q-ECOM-001: Shopify vs NetSuite master system for product content
IA-001: Shopify master for product content

items.title: E-Commerce Workshop: Document Shopify Customizations
items.description: Document all Shopify customizations (custom modules v3.2): headless frontend or theme extensions? Custom checkout flow? Custom fields to sync? Impact on NetSuite-Shopify integration.

references.description: Q-ECOM-002: Shopify customizations and integration impact
AMB-016: Shopify Plus Custom vs. Standard

items.title: E-Commerce Workshop: Define Fraud Detection Rules
items.description: Document fraud detection rules: triggers, fraud score calculation, review owner, SLA, automatic decline thresholds. Required for order approval workflow configuration.

items.title: IT Workshop: Document Lightspeed POS Versions and Integration Approach
items.description: Document Lightspeed POS versions at each store. Confirm API availability for integration. Define real-time vs. batch integration requirements. Identify integration challenges.

references.description: Q-IT-005: Lightspeed POS versions and integration approach

items.title: IT Workshop: Define Mobile App NetSuite Data/Function Requirements
items.description: Document mobile app requirements for NetSuite integration: data needed (inventory, customer, order status?), API endpoints, authentication, real-time vs. batch.

references.description: Q-IT-006: Mobile app NetSuite data/function requirements

items.title: CRM Workshop: Clarify Salesforce vs NetSuite Customer Data Master
items.description: Define master system for customer data: transactional (NetSuite), marketing (Salesforce), e-commerce (Shopify), profile (name/email/address - ONE master needed). Define data flow and conflict resolution.

references.description: Q-CRM-001: Salesforce vs NetSuite master system for customer data

items.title: CRM Workshop: Document Custom Salesforce Objects to Sync
items.description: Document all custom Salesforce objects that need to sync to NetSuite. Define field mapping, sync frequency, data flow direction.

references.description: Q-CRM-002: Custom Salesforce objects to sync

items.title: Payments Workshop: Define Stripe Payout Reconciliation Process
items.description: Document Stripe payout frequency (daily?). Define reconciliation process: payout file format, fees, refunds, chargebacks. Design NetSuite reconciliation workflow.

references.description: Q-PAY-001: Stripe payout frequency and reconciliation

items.title: Payments Workshop: Document Refund and Chargeback Handling
items.description: Document refund and chargeback handling in Stripe and NetSuite: workflow, accounting treatment, dispute management, reconciliation.

items.title: Wholesale Workshop: Document Quote-to-Order Workflow for Custom Frames
items.description: NEW SCOPE (2026-01-30): Document complete wholesale custom frame quote-to-order process for sports teams: quote creation, approval, pricing, sourcing, order conversion. Review existing documentation in quote-to-order-wholesale.md.

references.description: Q-PURCH-004: Wholesale custom frame quote-to-order process walkthrough
Existing documentation of wholesale quote process

items.title: Wholesale Workshop: Define Sourcing Tracker Enhancement for Estimate Linking
items.description: NEW SCOPE (2026-01-30): Define enhancements to Sourcing Tracker to support linking to wholesale Estimates, vendor status change notifications. Document workflow and notification requirements.

references.description: Q-PURCH-005: Sourcing Tracker enhancement for Estimate linking
GAP-PTP-005: Vendor sourcing status change notifications (NEW 2026-01-30)

items.title: Configure Chart of Accounts
items.description: Configure 200+ GL accounts for retail operations: 8-level numbering schema, revenue accounts by product category, expense accounts by department/function, multi-entity structure with elimination accounts.

items.title: Configure Subsidiary Structure
items.description: Configure subsidiary structure: Parent (SunStyle Retail Corporation), USA Subsidiary (SunStyle Retail USA LLC), Future Canada subsidiary setup. Full consolidation with intercompany elimination.

items.title: Configure Accounting Periods
items.description: Configure fiscal year (Jan-Dec): 12 monthly, 4 quarterly, 1 annual periods. Enable adjusting periods. Set up period close workflow targeting 5 business days after month-end.

items.title: Configure Currencies and Exchange Rates
items.description: Configure base currency (USD) and future CAD. Set up monthly exchange rate updates, locked at period close. Configure quarterly revaluation for foreign currency accounts (future).

items.title: Configure SuiteTax
items.description: Configure SuiteTax: physical nexus (stores in 5+ states) + economic nexus (e-commerce), automated rates by jurisdiction, exemptions (wholesale, prescription), filing (monthly CA, quarterly others).

items.title: Configure Departments, Classes, Locations
items.description: Configure departments (Corporate, Retail Ops, E-commerce, Technology, Marketing, Finance, HR), classes (25 stores + Warehouse + Corporate + E-commerce), locations (26 physical). Enable P&L segmentation.

items.title: Load Item Master Data (~2,000 SKUs)
items.description: Create and load ~2,000 SKUs: inventory parts (sunglasses), kits (display sets), services (fittings), non-inventory (marketing). Configure categories, attributes, pricing, costing (Average Cost), matrix items.

items.title: Load Vendor Master Data
items.description: Load vendor master data: categories (Eyewear Suppliers, Packaging, Service Providers, Technology), tiers (Preferred, Standard, Probationary), custom fields (lead time, MOQ, payment terms, quality rating).

items.title: Load Customer Master Data
items.description: Load customer master data: categories (Retail, Online, Wholesale, Employee, VIP), custom fields (loyalty tier, points, face shape, style preference, prescription info, marketing opt-in, LTV, fraud score).

items.title: Configure PO Workflow and Approvals
items.description: Configure PO approval workflow: auto-approve <$5K, Manager $5K-$25K, VP/CFO >$25K. Configure reorder automation, vendor selection (primary/fallback), EDI setup for major suppliers.

items.title: Configure Item Receipt Processing
items.description: Configure receiving: barcode scanning, quantity verification, quality inspection, discrepancy handling (over/under/damage), blind receiving option, put-away with bin assignment, 3-way match (PO/Receipt/Bill).

items.title: Configure AP Setup and Payment Processing
items.description: Configure AP: payment terms (Net 30, Net 60, 2/10 Net 30), approval (Controller >$10K), payment batching (weekly ACH), check printing, 1099 tracking.

items.title: Configure Inventory Locations and Bin Management
items.description: Configure 26 locations: Central Warehouse (primary, 50K sq ft, bin mgmt enabled), 25 Store Locations (retail, limited backstock), Corporate HQ (non-inventory). Configure bin management, cycle counting (ABC), reorder points.

items.title: Configure Reorder Points and Replenishment
items.description: Configure reorder point calculation (lead time demand + safety stock), auto-generate PO, allocation (push inventory to stores based on sales velocity), seasonality adjustments, quarterly review process.

items.title: Configure Inventory Transfer Orders
items.description: Configure transfer orders: Warehouse-to-Store, Store-to-Store, Store-to-Warehouse (returns). Approval thresholds (auto <$1K, Manager $1K-$5K, VP >$5K). In-transit tracking, carrier tracking, receipt scan verification.

items.title: Configure Cycle Counting
items.description: Configure cycle counting: ABC classification (A monthly, B quarterly, C semi-annual), blind counts, variance threshold (>5% or >10 units triggers recount), auto-adjust within threshold, manager approval over.

items.title: Load Historical Inventory Data
items.description: Load historical inventory data from current systems: on-hand quantities by location, bin locations (warehouse), valuation, transaction history (2-3 years).

references.description: Phase 3: Inventory Management (Weeks 7-9) - Historical inventory loading (Week 9)

items.title: Configure Sales Order Forms and Workflow
items.description: Configure sales order forms: Retail, E-commerce, Wholesale, Prescription. Custom fields (channel, store location, sales associate, loyalty points, fraud score). Workflow: fraud screening, inventory allocation, fulfillment routing, approval (>$5K, high fraud, large discount).

items.title: Configure Fulfillment and Omnichannel Routing
items.description: Configure fulfillment methods: Ship from Warehouse, Ship from Store, BOPIS, Curbside. Configure routing logic: check warehouse stock, find nearest store with stock, optimize cost/speed, avoid depleting store display. Configure picking, packing, ShipStation integration.

items.title: Configure Invoicing and AR
items.description: Configure invoicing: immediate (e-commerce), upon shipment (wholesale). Payment terms: Net 30 (wholesale), Due on Receipt (retail). Aging buckets, automated collections emails (15, 30, 45 days), bad debt write-off (120 days, CFO approval).

items.title: Configure Return Authorization Process
items.description: Configure RMA process: 30-day return window, unworn/original tags policy, exceptions (prescription/final sale). Self-service portal, email, phone, in-store RMA creation. Inspection workflow (resalable/damaged/defective), refund (original payment/store credit/exchange), restocking automation.

items.title: Configure Customer Deposits, Gift Cards, Loyalty Points
items.description: Configure deposits (special orders, custom prescription), store credit (from returns/compensation/promos), gift cards (liability tracking, partial redemption), loyalty points (100 pts = $10, 24-month expiration), payment methods (credit/debit, digital wallets, split payments).

items.title: Configure Shopify Integration
items.description: Configure Shopify Plus integration (Celigo or native connector): Products (NetSuite  Shopify), Orders (Shopify  NetSuite real-time), Inventory (NetSuite  Shopify every 5 min), Customers (bidirectional), Fulfillment Status (NetSuite  Shopify). Test end-to-end flows.

items.title: Configure Salesforce Integration
items.description: Configure Salesforce CRM integration (native connector or middleware): Customers (bidirectional, NetSuite master), Orders (NetSuite  Salesforce), Cases (Salesforce  NetSuite), Loyalty Data (NetSuite  Salesforce). Test end-to-end flows.

items.title: Configure Stripe Payment Integration
items.description: Configure Stripe integration (SuiteApp or API): Payment Authorization, Payment Capture, Refunds (NetSuite  Stripe), Payout Reconciliation (Stripe  NetSuite daily). Test payment flows and reconciliation.

items.title: Configure Shipping Carrier Integration
items.description: Configure ShipStation integration (or native carrier APIs): Shipment Creation (NetSuite  ShipStation/Carriers), Label Generation, Tracking Updates (Carriers  NetSuite webhooks), Rate Shopping (real-time API). Test shipping workflows.

items.title: Configure Lightspeed POS Integration
items.description: Configure Lightspeed POS integration (if keeping Lightspeed per TODO-003): real-time transactions, inventory sync, customer sync. Define integration architecture, error handling, monitoring. Test end-to-end flows.

predicates.condition: Decision made to keep Lightspeed POS (TODO-003 complete)

items.title: End-to-End Integration Testing
items.description: Test all integrations end-to-end: Shopify order  NetSuite  fulfillment  tracking  Shopify update. Salesforce case  NetSuite action. Stripe payment  NetSuite reconciliation. Test error handling, retry logic, monitoring.

items.title: Configure Custom Fields and Lists
items.description: Configure all custom fields (customer, item, transaction) and custom lists (loyalty tiers, face shapes, style preferences, frame materials, lens types, brands, sales channels, return reasons, fraud review status, fulfillment methods).

items.title: Configure Custom Records
items.description: Configure custom records: Prescription Record (linked to Customer), Store Performance Record (linked to Location), Loyalty Transaction Record (linked to Customer/Transaction).

items.title: Configure Workflows
items.description: Configure workflows: Order Approval (trigger: SO saved, conditions: total >$5K OR fraud >75 OR discount >20%), PO Approval, Return Processing (auto-approve if eligible), Customer Onboarding (welcome email, discount, segment assignment, loyalty account creation).

items.title: Configure PDF Templates
items.description: Configure branded PDF templates: Invoice (logo, line items, tax breakdown, payment terms, barcode), Packing Slip (order #, items, return QR code, thank you), Purchase Order (vendor-facing, professional layout).

items.title: Configure Email Templates
items.description: Configure email templates: Order Confirmation, Shipment Notification (tracking link), Delivery Confirmation, Return Label (instructions), Refund Processed, Back-in-Stock, Abandoned Cart (via Klaviyo), Loyalty Points Balance, Birthday Offer.

items.title: Configure Saved Searches and Reports
items.description: Configure saved searches and reports: Sales Dashboards (Executive, Store Performance, E-commerce, Daily Flash), Inventory Reports (Valuation, Stock Status, Slow-Moving, Stockout, Turnover, ABC Analysis), Financial Reports (P&L, Balance Sheet, Cash Flow, AR/AP Aging, Budget vs. Actual, Sales Tax), Customer Analytics (LTV, Loyalty, Cohort, RFM, Return Rate, CAC).

items.title: Configure Campaign Management and Promotions
items.description: Configure campaign management (email, social, in-store, influencer, paid search), promotion engine (% Off, $ Off, BOGO, free shipping, gift with purchase), stacking rules, channel targeting, date ranges, usage limits, coupon codes.

items.title: Configure Case Management and Knowledge Base
items.description: Configure case management (types: Order Issue, Product Defect, Return Request, General Inquiry; priorities, status, assignment, Zendesk/Salesforce integration), knowledge base (50+ articles, categories, search, customer portal), SLA and escalation rules.

items.title: User Acceptance Testing (UAT)
items.description: Conduct comprehensive UAT with key users across all modules: Record-to-Report, Procure-to-Pay, Order-to-Cash, Inventory, Integrations. Document test cases, execute tests, log defects, verify fixes, obtain sign-off.

items.title: User Training
items.description: Conduct user training for all user groups: Finance (2-3 days), Operations (2-3 days), Store Managers (2 days), Sales Associates (1 day), IT Administrators (3 days). Create training materials, record sessions, provide hands-on practice.

items.title: Create Go-Live Plan and Runbook
items.description: Create detailed go-live plan: cutover weekend schedule, data migration steps, system validation checklist, rollback plan, communication plan, hypercare schedule (24/7 first month), issue escalation matrix.

items.title: Execute Go-Live Cutover
items.description: Execute go-live cutover: final data migration, system validation, integrations smoke tests, user access provisioning, system go-live. Monitor system stability, address immediate issues, provide hypercare support.

items.title: Hypercare Support (Weeks 1-4 Post Go-Live)
items.description: Provide 24/7 hypercare support for first month post go-live: monitor system performance, address user issues, optimize workflows, fix defects, provide on-site support at warehouse and key stores. Conduct daily stand-ups, issue triage, rapid response.
